comments.comment: Hamuduruwane Islam agame kiyala thiyenawa anya agamata garukaranna. Namuth kisiwekuta balen islamayata enna kiyanna baha. Namuth Islam agame inna Aya Islam agama hariyata pilipadinna onai. Namuth Quranaye thiyena dewal varadi vidihata arathakathanaya karana epa obathuma budupilima kadanna kiyala islamaye kiyala naha. Minissu varadikarata karunakarala Islam agama varsdikiyanna epa. obathumanlatata kamathinam buddagama pilipadinna. Islam agame kawuru budupilima kaduwath owunta nithimargayen thaniwama daduwam denna. Ekathamai hoamade. Namuth Islam agame quranaya sambandayen waradi arthkathana minisunta kiyanna epa. Siddi lebbeth rate nidhasa venuwen yam karthwyak Kara kiyala mathaka thiyaganna. Varadikarapu ayata nithyanukula daduwam denna.

comments.comment: Genu pahak nevei haamaduruvane! Hatharak puluvan kiyala thiyanne.echarai. e kaale wiveslaa or genuu ona tharan thiyaagena hitiya. Islama thamai ekta seemaavak kare. Hora genu thiyaagandath be kiyala thiyanne islaama vitharai. Ehema thibunoth mokada punishment kiyalth thiyanne islaama vitharai. Thava ekk nevei hatharama ekama vidihata balaaganna puluvan koyala thibunoth vitharai eketa vediya merry karanda puluvan. So bendoth wife lamai gena balanda one kiyalath thiyanne islaamai. Western countries vala balanda kochara lamai eka parent ekka innavda kiyala.bendala daala gihilla.balan ne.eoli aagamika sanskruthiyak ne.islaama be eva.
comments.author: Abdullah

comments.comment:
We are not tagught to any one to islam in a mosques. Please come and join with us in our prayers. Ohoma sinahala girls va aagama maaru karanda kohevath kiyan ne. Meka veradi adahasa. Kenek aagama gena iganagena, or igana ganda aasava thibunoth egollonta puluvan evilla ahanna. Ehema hera kaatavath bala karanda be. 
Islama aagame pilima pray karana eka loku pavak thamai.hebei eeta vadaa pavak thamai anniya aagamika thena, pilima, egollonge aagamata, priest laata apahaasa karana eka eeeta vada veradi. Veradi picture eka thamai ogollonta mevahanse denne. Nabithuma kiwa kawruth aniya agamaika deval valata apahsa karoth eya muslim nevei kiyala kiwa. Thava yudda velaavadith egollonge worship places, pilima, egollonge priest,ladies,children,old people ayava aaraksha karana eka ape vagakeema kiyala thiyanava.islam kavadaavath e vage deval karanda kiyala ne. Kavru hari ehema karaa nan eka punishable offence. Palliye kavadaavath ehema ugannan ne apita.
comments.author: Abdullah

comments.comment:
Ane haamaduruvane! Quraanaye kiyala thiyana deval gena thava denuma one obavahansata. Quraanaya kiyanne eka paarata pahalavecha eka nevei. Kaalakin kaalakin aapu sentences tika. Obavahanse kiyapu ara vachana tika koi velaave aapu eka kiyala obavahanse iganaganna. Me wage samahara vachana aaye jeevithe follow karanda be. Eka edaa e siddiyata adaala vitharai. Ehema karoth eka lokuma loku pavak.
9/5 vaganthiya aapu velaava beluvoth, eka eda araabiye hitiya muslim novana kalli dekaka athara vecha porandu kadapu nisa. Muslim ayath ekka kalliyak hitiya, anith kalliya ehaa petha hitiya. Degolloa athara prashna thibuna kalin indan.muslim aya vandanaavata giya velaave vandanaa karanda dun ne.e velaadi givsumak athsan kara. E kalli dekakin ekk muslim ayath ekka hitiya.e avrudde vandanna karanda dun ne kaatavath.anith avrudda indan thami puluvan kiyala thibune.e givusume godaak deval gena thibuna karanda be kiyala. But tika kaalakin e givsuma keduva e kuraish kiyana araabi kalliya.egollo kare muslim ayath ekka hitapu e kalliye samahara ayava meruva.kalin vagema. Ehema poranduva givisuma kedicha nisa yuddayak patanvuna.e yuddaye velaavadi thamai me sentence eka pahalavune.meka aave muslim aya venuven nemei. Eka edaata vitharai valangu. 
Terroristsla islaama gena denuma nethuva,den obavahanse hithana vidihata hithagena veradi vedak karanava.eka egollonta rate loke kulappan karanda one nisa allagena inna thrumbuva hera ettha eka nevei.
comments.author: Abdullah

comments.comment: Muslim minissu godak duk widinawa, ewa eyalata ganak ne. Mkada hithanne marunata passe heaven 1ta yanawa kiyala. Lamai godak hadala balaganna bari handa kalin bandanawa. Kollo podi wayasin job welata yawanawa. Habai ammai thathai thawa gedarata wela lamai hadanawa. Ithn ara kollange pana yanawa. Eth unta ganak ne. Harinam muslim podi kello newe ammalawa bandala denna one. Amma hadana lamai balagannat one ara awrudu 15,18 podi kollonta. Kisima aramunak ne lamai hadanna saththu wage ohe enawa eliyata. Lamai kiyannet dukak kiyana eka eyalata theren ne. Godak muslim minissu anith agam welata garu keran ne. Uganwana deqal thama ithin. Pothe weredda.
